title: No big money
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, John Taylor and Doug White
brief_description: The Hudon family left the city to become modern pioneers on their ranch in the Cariboo country of British Columbia The winters are harsh, the work load is heavy, money is scarce, but they live on their own land. The film presents an unvarnished look at the problems and joys they experience as a family.
